item.title: Stick RPG Scripts
item.dc:creator: @SCOTTY1 -SCOTTY-
item.description:
@SCOTTY1 wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:2, topic:11381”]Cool scripts.

Do they work every time? Cause it uses Coordinates to click instead of events and bitmaps.[/quote]
Thx Ron yea they do you just need to select the window

phonnygoblin:

DUDE THE CASINO THINGY IF WRONG JUST HIT TAB A FEW TIMES AND HOLD ENTER!

Well sorry i didnt make it so dont go yelling at me you could just say…
“Hey -SCOTTY- you could just press hit tab a few times then hold enter” no need for caps

item.title: Stick RPG Scripts
item.dc:creator: @SCOTTY1 -SCOTTY-
item.description:
@SCOTTY1 wrote:

-List-

[ul][li]Auto News Watcher-By Do0mz[/li]
[li]Auto Fitness Watcher-By Me[/li]
[li]Auto Date Watcher-Me[/li]
[li]Auto Sleeper-Do0mz[/li]
[li]Auto Gambler-Do0mz[/li][/ul]

-Auto News Watcher-
-By Do0mz
[scar]{–Created By Do0mz–}
{–This script will watch the news 11 times and then sleep
giving you intelegence, it will repeat over and over–}

program New;

Const
Waittime = 1000;// MAx time of gaps between movements (too fast can fuck it).

procedure news;
begin
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(217,193, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(478,263, true);
end;

begin
repeat
news
until(false)
end.[/scar]

-Auto Fitness Watcher-
-By Me
[scar]{**************************************************************}
{ }
{ -SCOTTY’S- }
{ Auto Fitness Watcher }
{ Hello and thx for using my Auto Fitness Watcher }
{ }
{ Have Fun! }
{ -Credits- }
{ Me }
{ Do0mz }
{**************************************************************}
Program New;

Const
Waittime = 1000;//Leave Me Alone Please (If it gose to fast you may change)

Procedure News;
begin
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(284,179, true);

-Sleeper-
-By Do0mz
[scar]{–Created By Do0mz–}
{–This script will sleep over and over giving you money in the bank–}
{–You MUST start with money in your bank or this will be pointless–}

program New;
procedure sleep;
begin
ClickMouse(224,183, true);
wait(500);
ClickMouse(492,264, true);
end;

begin
repeat
sleep
until(false)
end.[/scar]

-Gambler-
-By Do0mz
[scar]{–Created By Do0mz–}
{–It takes ages setting 1million for your bid in the casino so this will do it
for you–}

program New;

Const
Waittime = 10;// How often you want to click (10 is perfect).

procedure gamble;
begin
ClickMouse(126,244, true);//change it to the position of the number
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(126,244, true);//set the same as the other one
end;

begin
repeat
gamble
until(false)
end.[/scar]
